svg.title: WebRoutines end-to-end flow animation
svg.desc: Animated sequence: empty tab with Runner Home, starting a routine, tab-group step navigation, focus mode mini-controller, then returning to sidepanel.

g.text: Sidepanel is open with Runner Home and no active runners.
Next: open routines and start one.
Click run on a routine card to create a tab-group runner.
Create, run, edit, and backup routines.
Mini-controller overlays the page for quick next/previous navigation.
Review focused runner and continue with sidebar navigation.
Status: Focus mode exited, runner still active
You can continue with Previous / Next / Jump from sidepanel.

svg.text: Sequence: Runner Home (empty) → Routines (start) → Tab-group navigation → Focus mode → Return to sidebar
